text.value: Achieve Financial Freedom Faster and Safer
Learn the strategies top financial analysis use to help their clients build wealth.

setting_block_4.text: We have been producing top-notch, comprehensive, and affordable courses on financial trading and value investing for students all over the world since 2014.

setting_block_5.text: Whether you're an entrepreneur, a CEO, a trader, an investor, or just interested in what we do — we're here to help you build a better future.

setting_block_6.text: We offer courses that answer ALL your investing and trading questions and show you what's working in the market right now. You'll learn like an insider and get access to all the resources you need to succeed.

setting_block_1.text: In The Next 6 Months, You Could…

setting_block_3.text: The right financial moves can make all the difference. We’ll cover it all in Financial Freedom Bootcamp.

setting_block_paragraph_2.text: Your credit is the basis of your financial stability. Learn actionable steps you can take to increase your score to over 750 in the next 6 months, including:

title.text: Good debt: What it is and how to build/manage it
How many credit cards you should have
The correct balance of revolving and installment debt

setting_block_paragraph_3.text: You’ll finish this course with a complete picture of what makes up your credit score and how to achieve the score you need for your next big purchase.

setting_block_headings_paragraphs.text: With your credit in good shape, the next step is to build a sizable nest egg you can rely on. In this lesson, you’ll learn:
You’ll finish this course with a savings goal and a plan to make it a reality.
The secret to building wealth is to stop trading your time for money. In this lesson, you’ll learn:
You’ll finish this lesson with your passive income plan for the next 5 years.
For many, the goal is to retire as soon as possible and still live a comfortable lifestyle. In this course, you’ll learn:
You’ll finish this course with a retirement plan and a road map to get there.

title.text: How to include savings in your budget
The best place to keep your savings
The different types of passive income
The best tax strategies for passive income
How much you need to retire at any age
The best way to manage retirement funds
The best investments to make based on your age

setting_block_paragraph.text: In Financial Freedom Bootcamp, you’ll learn how to finally take control of your financial future.

setting_block_paragraph_2.text: After graduating with my MBA, I was hit with over 100K in student loan debt. Not exactly the way I expected to start my new career! But with smart financial decisions and a little hard work, I was debt-free in a year and well on my way to early retirement.

setting_block_paragraph_3.text: Now I use what I've learned to help people just like you find financial freedom. I’ll show you how to earn more, save more, and put your money to work for you with smart investments.

setting_reviews_card.text: “Simone quite simply challenges you to be your best version of you, to really define what your niche is and then empowers you to own it, that you have clarity and consistency resulting in an impactful and authentic brand which wins you business”
“As a former teacher, I was encouraged to see these important elements high lighted.”
“The course was insightful. I don't know how I can print out my online certificate.”
“Useful details on people management suitable for all levels of management roles. Good topics & course contents.”
“Really enjoyed the course. It's a great entry level option for people interested in finding out about people management.”
“I really benefited from the People management course. Valuable input from other participants, too, and the course has a really good structure.”

title.text: Can I share course info with a friend?
Do you have any incentives if I refer a friend?
I loved this bootcamp and want more! What other courses do you offer?

paragraph.text: Like anything in life, you will get out of this bootcamp what you put into it. While we do offer a 14-day money-back guarantee, the results you get are up to you. We can promise that if you commit to the process and put in the work, you will see results.
